title: G.O.P. Seeks to Erase Democratic Supermajority in New York Legislature
description: A Republican surge is threatening to counter gains made by progressive-minded Democrats, who have pushed the State Legislature to the left in recent years.
dc:creator: Luis Ferré-Sadurní
media:credit: Cindy Schultz for The New York Times
media:description: Rob Ortt, the State Senate Republican minority leader, center, expects that his party will win enough seats to end the Democrats’ supermajority in his chamber.
